plays.text: Penalty to Martin Brodeur 2 minutes for Roughing Alexei Kovalev served by Scott Gomez
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for High Sticking John Madden
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Eric Meloche 2 minutes for Interference Scott Gomez
Penalty to Janne Laukkanen 2 minutes for Interference Scott Gomez
Penalty to Patrik Elias 2 minutes for Roughing Josef Melichar
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Interference Jim McKenzie
Penalty to Josef Melichar 2 minutes for Slashing Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Aleksey Morozov assisted by Mario Lemieux and Toby Petersen
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Crosschecking Brian Gionta
Goal scored by Bobby Holik assisted by Brian Rafalski and Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Brian Rafalski assisted by Bobby Holik and Valeri Kamensky
